chapter.title: Accessing Scarab via XML-RPC
chapter.simpara: It is possible to access remotely the Scarab functionalities via XML-RPC.
An example is supplied in the Scarab sources (under src/java):

listitem.simpara: la classe org.tigris.scarab.util.SimpleHandler.java (server, in Scarab) is used by the Scarab-Subversion integration (read the corresponding chapter in the Scarab User's Guide);
la classe org.tigris.scarab.util.SimpleHandlerClient.java (client, in another application) is a simple example of using the server above.
